Intelligent Audit

Backed by our global team of auditors and intelligent technology, your business can drive compliance, identify potential fraud, and minimize workloads for your team.

Contact us
Add intelligence and control to your auditing process

Businesses are always looking for ways to move faster and stay ahead of the competition. The trick is to build strategies that are both efficient and don’t lead to noncompliance or fraud. Download the eBook and learn five ways you can assess and improve your existing audit process.

Get the eBook

Save time on expense claims and increase policy compliance

By using SAP Concur solutions and experts to manage the auditing process, your team can focus on other tasks while improving compliance and VAT management. Read the brochure for tips on building a culture of compliance across your business.

Get tips for compliance

Here’s what Intelligent Audit can do for your business
Get better outcomes when people are backed by AI

By bringing human auditors and AI together, businesses can feel more confident in their ability to identify misuse, waste, and noncompliant spending.

Improve tax and regulatory compliance

Ensure that appropriate documentation is provided and verify that item tax values match the supporting receipt.

Give your team more time to focus on other tasks

Let our team of global auditors resolve exceptions directly with employees and provide day-to-day support for your administrator.

Get insight into audit analytics

Review exception details, identify trends, and determine next steps during regular consulting sessions.

Get help in multiple languages

Our team of global auditors offer receipt validation and policy compliance for every language available in Concur Travel and Concur Expense.

Validate receipts match expenses

A receipt audit matches the associated expense to the date, amount, vendor, expense type, and receipt clarity.

The back-end reporting and auditing functionality makes it a great tool to control and monitor expenses across the organization.”

SAP Concur user
Read the full review

Learn about Concur Expense

Simplify the travel experience, increase compliance, and control costs — all in one place.

Concur Invoice

Learn about Concur Invoice

Concur Request

Simplify and speed up requests and approvals, drive policy compliance, and take control of company spend.

Learn about Concur Request

Contact us to learn more about SAP Concur solutions

To hear from an SAP Concur representative, please complete the form or call us at 1800-1020-650.
